article_title: Teenager impaled after falling from cliff on Long Island
article_text:
RIVERHEAD, N.Y. — An 18-year-old man has died after falling off bluffs and becoming impaled on a tree limb on Long Island.

Riverhead police say Matthew Grimaldi of Lake Grove, N.Y., fell near Hulse Landing Beach in Wading River shortly before 7 p.m. Sunday.

He and friends attending a party had climbed onto the nearby bluffs, and Grimaldi lost his footing while trying to come down. He landed on the branches of a felled tree.

He was pronounced dead on arrival at a local hospital.
